content.rendered:
At Automax 4×4 we offer two different types of interest free payment options. Zip Pay and Afterpay. With varying and flexible payment terms, your next service, lift kit, bullbar or whatever the heart desires can be paid for interest free instore or online.

To Apply for a Zip Pay Account simply visit:

To Apply for an Afterpay account simply visit:
